projects.name: Netflix-frontend clone
projects.description: Designed websites frontend for Netflix landing page where the utilization of CSS3 was very effective. Applied web designing skills for creating the interface by using Bootstrap5. Creating web pages with HTML and styling them using CSS.

projects.name: Online Portfolio
projects.description: Front-end Pages using Front-end Technologies. Developed a personal portfolio website using React.js to showcase projects and skills. Implemented a responsive design for optimal viewing across various devices.

projects.name: Carbon Emission Calculator
projects.description: Introducing the Carbon Emission Calculator to measure individual and organizational carbon footprints. This tool allows users to quantify their greenhouse gas emissions and identify opportunities for reduction. The Carbon Emission Calculator offers a user-friendly interface to input data on energy consumption, travel, and lifestyle choices. It provides a comprehensive analysis of individual or organizational emissions and suggests actionable steps to reduce them.

experiences.description: Completed a 2-weeks Summer internship in Mini Project. Much Helpful in Gaining Practical knowledge and experience while training and made projects while involved in as an intern. Produced Research paper and report during internship.

Created 3 projects- login page, Registration Form and Calculator while ensuring good coding practices. Developed user interfaces with modern JavaScript frameworks, HTML5, and CSS3. Adapted quickly to a constantly changing, deadline-driven environment, consistently meeting tight timelines and delivering the 5 times better results.
